title: My 17 birth on the 17
body:
So guys next Friday is my 17 and I was wondering if we could get a couple of riot employees to go up against ether that night or the next (not Always on early on a Friday)
And hey even if no riot people I'm going to set a discord server tomorrow so if anyone wants to come play some games come join (I'll post the link tomorrow)
See you guys soon

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Not this one next friday dude
